alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 9:32PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Phelps, northwestern Kearney and south central Buffalo Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 932 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Funk, or 11 miles southwest of Kearney, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kearney. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 264 and 277. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Nebraska.
